data.title: Arizona State University
data.meta_description: Welcome to ASU Student Housing. One of the best parts about the college experience is living on campus. Discover the Sun Devil way of life.
data.text:
ASU spirit, pride and traditions start with living on campus.

Living at ASU promotes creative connections and innovation both inside and outside of the classroom while providing a supportive, close-knit environment designed to set you up for success.

When you live on campus, you should take advantage of the opportunities that are right outside your door. Immerse yourself in Sun Devil spirit, pride and tradition. Enjoy the convenience of all-inclusive living, while being steps away from academic buildings, student services and campus dining locations.

Discover the Sun Devil way of life and make the most of your time at ASU.
